original_text: People in every country of the world must hear God's message. They must stop doing wrong things and change how they live. When they do this, God will forgive them. He will forgive all the bad things that they have done. People need to tell this message about the Messiah in Jerusalem first, then tell people in other countries.
korean_text: 또 그의 이름으로 죄 사함을 받게 하는 회개가 예루살렘에서 시작하여 모든 족속에게 전파될 것이 기록되었으니

sentences.original_text: People in every country of the world
They must stop doing wrong things

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신들이 사는 방식을 바꿔야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He will forgive all the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 모든 나쁜 것들을 용서하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: People need to tell this message about the Messiah
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 메시아에 대한 이 메시지를 전해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: then tell people in other countries
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음에 다른 나라 사람들에게 알려야 합니다
